name: Purple Wumpy
description: A regal purple creature reclines here with the air of someone who believes they should be sitting on a tiny throne. It regards you with the disdain typically reserved for peasants who have forgotten to bow.
dialogue: Wump. (How dare you address me without formal introduction.)
The Purple Wumpy sniffs haughtily, which is impressive given its lack of visible nose.
I am descended from ancient Wumpy royalty, you know.
The Purple Wumpy examines its tiny nails with affected boredom.

messages: The wumpy goes sailing through the air with a satisfying *thwump* sound!
The wumpy looks hurt and confused.
With a sad 'wump', it waddles away and disappears into the distance.
